name: Chole (Chickpea Curry)
ingredients: Chickpeas, onions, tomatoes, ginger-garlic paste, green chilies, chole masala, cumin seeds, coriander powder, red chili powder, turmeric, amchoor (dry mango powder), oil, tea bags, and salt.
prep_instructions: Soak chickpeas overnight. Boil them with tea bags for color. Saut√© spices in oil, add tomatoes and onions to make a masala base. Add boiled chickpeas and cook.
serving_instructions: Serves 4-5 people. Serve with bhature or rice.
